Message.Title: I laught at you and you alone.. and maybe AMD stock..

Topic.Title: Shield - hands on impression from the booth

Message.Msg: pumper boyz here lie all day long to deceive the unsuspecting..... "Apparently several tens of millions of gamers and graphics users buy into that model." brand new product with brand new business model has not even been launched, not one single unit shipped, and pumper boyz are lying through their teeth saying tens of millions of gamers and graphics users buy into that model". they lie so much, I bet you they believe their own lies too.

Message.Title: Shield ships Jul31
Message.Msg: "We want to thank you for your patience and for sticking with us through the shipment delay of your SHIELD. We have great news to share with you - your SHIELD will ship on July 31st. Our goal has always been to ship the perfect product, so we made sure we submitted SHIELD to the most rigorous mechanical testing and quality assurance standards in the industry. We built SHIELD because we love playing games, and we hope you enjoy it as much as we do. SHIELD team "

There seemed to be some clues as to the imminent arrival of Shield very SOON, as I noticed, on Friday, that a number of game devs announced the release their Shield optimized games -- officially available on July 23. And all kinds of Shield accessories started to show up on Amazon. I thought then, hmmm, the wait must be over.
